title: Blaming you team is like
body:
Trying to sing a song and then blaming the song writers for writing it incorrectly.

- I'm learning to sing boys.

replies.body: Sometimes it is your teams fault.
I agree with this. But there is no point in blaming your team because it won't fix anything. You can't help your team mates improve their overall game but you can improve yours.

> [{quoted}](name=TSM BjergWannabe,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fsO6UYvd,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-05-24T11:48:35.790+0000)
>
> I agree with this. But there is no point in blaming your team because it won't fix anything. You can't help your team mates improve their overall game but you can improve yours.

I preach that

Sometimes you sing trough your nose just 'cause that's how you always did.
L2Sing.
I +1 each of your posts to even it out, they looked ugly at 0 when you did nothing wrong
